description: {"blocks":[{"key":"6tvfk","text":"Protocol for qRT-PCR sample preparation for analysis using a RotorGeneQ machine (Qiagen). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"9rna1","text":"Synthesise cDNA libraries from total RNA from each sample using a High-Capacity cDNA Reverse Transcription Kit (Applied Biosystems), using Oligo(dT)20 primers.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":148,"length":2}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9a1if","text":"Place the synthesised libraries on ice, and dilute the libraries 1:3 by adding   of DEPC-treated H2O to each sample, pipetting up and down gently to mix ~ 8 times.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":79,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2a53s","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"60","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dnn7c","text":"Dilute primer stocks by adding   of the forward primer, and   of the reverse primer, to   of DEPC-treated H2O on ice to make a final combined forward and reverse primer stock of   forward primer and   reverse primer for each gene target to be analysed. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":31,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":60,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":88,"length":1},{"key":3,"offset":178,"length":1},{"key":4,"offset":199,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"fcj1e","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"2","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"2","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"2":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"46","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"3":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"4","error_concentration":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":29}},"4":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"4","error_concentration":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":29}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"9hn93","text":"Thaw the 2x QuantiNova SYBR green master mix (Qiagen) on ice.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d8f18","text":"Depending on the number of samples being analysed, assemble a sample master mix (not containing the cDNA library) containing the following:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9ev7c","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2u5vg","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3trof","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"ka3i","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{},"colTitles":["Reagent","Volume (1x)"],"colWidths":["339","201"],"data":[["2x SYBR Green Master Mix","5 uL"],["4 uM forward and 4 uM reverse primer master mix","1 uL"],["cDNA library (to be added individually to each tube)","4 uL"],["Total volume","10 uL"]],"guid":"3A070FD0367C11EEB491EDFFF004ECE4","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":"","mergeCells":{},"printData":[["2x SYBR Green Master Mix","5 uL"],["4 uM forward and 4 uM reverse primer master mix","1 uL"],["cDNA library (to be added individually to each tube)","4 uL"],["Total volume","10 uL"]],"rowHeights":[23,23,23,23]}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"r3pq","text":"To qRT-PCR tubes sitting on ice (Qiagen – RotorGeneQ compatible), add   of the master mix for each target gene to the desired tubes, and add   of the appropriate cDNA library to each sample.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":70,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":141,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"6","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"4","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2irtb","text":"Tap the rack holder to ensure all solution is at the bottom of the tube before capping each sample.(NOTE: samples do not need to be mixed prior to analysis)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bgesi","text":"Load and run the samples on a RotorGeneQ (Qiagen) machine using the desired parameters for the gene targets you are analysing. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: qRT-PCR sample preparation
